detail_desc: Waist bag in woven fabric with an embroidered text motif. One large compartment with a concealed zip at the front and one zipped compartment at the back. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth approx. 5 cm. Height approx. 16 cm. Width approx. 28 cm.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed, embroidered yoke at the front, opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a turtle neck in a slightly shorter, boxy fit with a straight hem. Long raglan sleeves with block-coloured sections.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline.
Treggings in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button and front and back pockets.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Top in jersey crêpe with a cut-out pattern and scalloped trim at the hem, and short sleeves with scalloped trims.
Rugby shirt in soft cotton jersey with a woven collar, button placket, appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a scuba shaft, loop front and back, mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Long jumper in a soft double knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Longer at the back.

Long dress in airy chiffon crêpe made partly from recycled polyester. V-neck with a large flounce at the top, a seam at the waist and a wide, straight-cut skirt. Low-cut back with narrow horizontal ties, and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the top, a loop at the back and patterned soles.

Handbag in imitation leather with imitation suede sections, two handles and a zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 13x23x30 cm.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a pompom on the top and wide sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a scalloped neckline and short puff sleeves with a scalloped edge.
Short, off-the shoulder top in soft, ribbed fabric with long sleeves.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt in softly draping satin with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Jacket in woven fabric with a concealed two-way zip down the front and a lined stand-up collar with fasteners. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, flap side pockets with a button, and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Short, boxy jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a slightly wider neckline.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Strapless jersey dress with an elasticated waist. Inner top with elastication at the top.
High-waisted twill shorts with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, and fake back pockets.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton twill with press-studs down the front and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners at the front. One open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wedge-heeled sandals in imitation suede with long straps at the top that tie around the ankles and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2 cm. Heel 9 cm.

Jacket in twill with metal buttons and a pile collar, Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Pile lining.
Imitation leather mules with adjustable straps with metal buckles. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scallop-edged cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Padded jacket with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Shoulder bag in soft imitation leather that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Height approx. 18 cm. Width approx. 26 cm.

Tunic in airy, patterned jersey with a frilled collar and a small V-neck with a button at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs and a narrow tie belt under the bust. The polyester content of the tunic is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with flounces, inset lace trims, shoulder straps and short, flounced sleeves. Gentle V-neck with ties at the neckline and an elasticated seam and flounce at the hem.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long cardigan in a fine-knit mohair and wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs. No buttons.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and long raglan sleeves with lace. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft, airy, patterned viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short necklace in partly recycled metal with shell-shaped links. Adjustable length.
Scarf in a patterned cotton and silk blend. Size 63x180 cm.
Cotton jersey dress with a patterned tulle skirt. Glittery print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Satin-lined skirt.
Short wrapover skirt in soft cotton twill. High waist with a concealed button and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings, and a flap side pocket. Unlined.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket with a sewn-in decorative handkerchief, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Semi-matte socks with a short shaft. 20 denier.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and fake pockets. Jersey lining.
Cotton jersey leggings with sewn-in pin-tucks on the legs and a high elasticated waist.
Jumpsuit in mulberry silk with a V-neck, double, narrow shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a smocked panel at the top and bottom and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Top in a patterned fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Plastic mug with a silicone lid. Diameter 8.5 cm, height including lid 13.5 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton with a motif and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Straight-cut top in satin with smocking at the top and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Bracelet in fabric and metal with shells. Adjustable length.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in an airy weave with sequined details, a V-neck and gathers at the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam under the bust with an inset, sequined section at the front and elasticated smocking at the back. Lined.

Shirt in soft denim with a gently tapered waist. Collar, press-studs down the front and a double-layered yoke with a V-shaped seam at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a slightly lower neckline at the front.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
